methods.clearCallsite: Clear any previously set callsite. See setCallsite(String)
methods.getNugget:
*Overload 1*  
  :param name: (java.lang.String) - the nugget name
  :return: (io.deephaven.db.tables.utils.QueryPerformanceNugget) A new QueryPerformanceNugget to encapsulate user query operations. done() must be called on the nugget.
  
*Overload 2*  
  :param name: (java.lang.String) - the nugget name
  :param inputSize: (long) - the nugget's input size
  :return: (io.deephaven.db.tables.utils.QueryPerformanceNugget) A new QueryPerformanceNugget to encapsulate user query operations. done() must be called on the nugget.
methods.getPoolAllocatedBytesForCurrentThread:
Get the total bytes of pool-allocated memory attributed to this thread via
 recordPoolAllocation(Supplier).

:return: (long) The total bytes of pool-allocated memory attributed to this thread.
methods.getState:
Return the query's current state

:return: (io.deephaven.db.tables.utils.QueryState) the query's state or null if it isn't initialized yet
methods.recordPoolAllocation:
Record a single-threaded operation's allocations as "pool" allocated memory attributable to the current thread.

Note: Java generics information - <RESULT_TYPE>

:param operation: (java.util.function.Supplier<RESULT_TYPE>) - The operation to record allocation for
:return: (RESULT_TYPE) The result of the operation.
methods.setCallsite:
**Incompatible overloads text - text from the first overload:**


 Attempt to compute and set the thread local callsite so that invocations of getCallerLine() will not
 spend time trying to recompute.
 

 Users should follow the best practice as described by setCallsite(String)

*Overload 1*  
  :param callsite: (java.lang.String) - The call site to use.
  :return: (boolean) true if successfully set, false otherwise/
  
*Overload 2*  
  :return: (boolean) true if the callsite was computed and set.
methods.startQuery:
Start a query.

:param description: (java.lang.String) - A description for the query.
:return: (int) a unique evaluation number to identify this query execution.
methods.withNugget:
Surround the given code with a Performance Nugget

*Overload 1*  
  :param name: (java.lang.String) - the nugget name
  :param r: (io.deephaven.base.Procedure.Nullary) - the stuff to run
  
*Overload 2*  
  Note: Java generics information - <T>
  
  :param name: (java.lang.String) - the nugget name
  :param r: (java.util.function.Supplier<T>) - the stuff to run
  :return: (T) the result of the stuff to run
  
*Overload 3*  
  :param name: (java.lang.String) - the nugget name
  :param inputSize: long
  :param r: (io.deephaven.base.Procedure.Nullary) - the stuff to run
  
*Overload 4*  
  Note: Java generics information - <T>
  
  :param name: (java.lang.String) - the nugget name
  :param inputSize: long
  :param r: (java.util.function.Supplier<T>) - the stuff to run
  :return: (T) the result of the stuff to run
methods.withNuggetThrowing:
Surround the given code with a Performance Nugget

*Overload 1*  
  Note: Java generics information - <T extends java.lang.Exception>
  
  :param name: java.lang.String
  :param r: (io.deephaven.base.Procedure.ThrowingNullary<T>) - the stuff to run
  
*Overload 2*  
  Note: Java generics information - <R,
  ExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception>
  
  :param name: (java.lang.String) - the nugget name
  :param r: (io.deephaven.base.Function.ThrowingNullary<R,ExceptionType>) - the stuff to run
  :return: (R) the result of the stuff to run
  
*Overload 3*  
  Note: Java generics information - <T extends java.lang.Exception>
  
  :param name: java.lang.String
  :param inputSize: long
  :param r: (io.deephaven.base.Procedure.ThrowingNullary<T>) - the stuff to run
  
*Overload 4*  
  Note: Java generics information - <R,
  ExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception>
  
  :param name: (java.lang.String) - the nugget name
  :param inputSize: long
  :param r: (io.deephaven.base.Function.ThrowingNullary<R,ExceptionType>) - the stuff to run
  :return: (R) the result of the stuff to run

text:
Query performance instrumentation tools. Manages a hierarchy of QueryPerformanceNugget instances.
 
 Thread-safety note: This used to be thread-safe only by virtue of using a thread-local instance. Now it's
 aggressively synchronized so we can abort it from outside the "owner" thread.
